name: Kettlebells Course
description: Perform a systematic progression of exercises with two kettlebells: swings, cleans, push presses, thrusters, snatches and the long cycle (clean and jerk) Increase endurance through movement-specific breathing cycles.

name: WEIGHTLIFTING
description: Weight training is a common type of strength training for developing the strength and size of skeletal muscles. It uses the force of gravity in the form of weighted bars, dumbbells or weight stacks in order to oppose the force generated by muscle through concentric or eccentric contraction.

name: ADVANCED GYMNASTIC
description: Gymnastics is a sport that includes physical exercises requiring balance, strength, flexibility, agility, coordination, dedication and endurance..

name: Meditation
description: Meditation is a practice in which an individual uses a technique – such as mindfulness, or focusing the mind on a particular object, thought, or activity – to train attention and awareness, and achieve a mentally clear and emotionally calm and stable state.

name: Running
description: Both running and jogging are forms of aerobic exercise. A beginner to exercise should start with brisk walking
